sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Action) Once per game session, the character can take an Incite Rebellion action to make a hard (3 difficulty dice) Coercion check. If successful, a number of beings up to his ranks in Coercion become unhappy and try to take action against an organization or authority with power over them until the end of the encounter. This could be due to something the character did or said, or just because the beings were already unhappy with their position.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Incite Rebellion</name> <number>TAL0001272</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-12 05:15:17</sys_created_on> <sys_id>4eef3beb2fdca090e0f497eef699b6fb</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-12 05:15:17</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
